casebody.data:
JOHN HASATT v. EDWARD M. TOWNSEND.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Fbeedman and Tbuax, JJ.

Decided April 4, 1881. . Complaint dismissed, and exceptions ordered to be heard at general term in first instance. *540O. J. Wells, for plaintiff. North, Ward & Wagstaff, attorneys, and Lang-don Ward, of counsel, for defendant. Opinion pee Curiam.

Exceptions overruled, and judgment to be entered, with costs.
